LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.Xenobiologis.Update: Adeptus Mechanicus: Xenobiologis Update - Added update notice. - Finaly figured out how to fix the multiple meat entries. - Added Humanlike Mechanicus Pawns (Tech-Priest and Skitarii are now humanlikes with armour). - Disabled Siege's for all non Humanlike races.
